contactListInfoTooltip: This is the data for the account(s) the contact is associated with.

contactIcon.needsEverything: This is a new contact with no linked account. Fill in the information to get started.
contactIcon.needsContact: Add the missing contact information to connect this person to the account.
contactIcon.needsAccount: Link this contact to a new or existing account so that communication appears in the activity stream.
contactIcon.complete: You did it! All communication is now connected to the account and contact.

requiredFields: Please make sure all required fields are filled in.
